about.heading: About Nasim
about.subheading: Driven by curiosity and a love for code, I transform complex ideas into elegant, user-friendly applications.
bioParagraphs: a full-stack software engineer with a passion for solving real-world problems through clean, scalable code. I began my journey in tech at just 16, earning a Computer Science degree from King’s College London and diving straight into the software industry.

I’ve since built impactful systems at Sky and American Express, contributing across the stack using technologies like Java, Spring Boot, React, and Docker. From cloud infrastructure to UI/UX, I enjoy shaping robust solutions from backend logic to front-end polish.

Outside of work, I love experimenting with automation tools and side projects—like my EPG generator and portfolio site—to sharpen my skills and explore new tech. I'm driven by curiosity, collaboration, and a strong belief that thoughtful engineering can elevate any product.
